subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: Roy Sommer, 58, who is 20 victories from becoming the American Hockey League’s career coaching leader, is a blue-collar teacher most comfortable in flip-flops and straight talk.
snippet: Roy Sommer, 58, who is 20 victories from becoming the American Hockey League’s career coaching leader, is a blue-collar teacher most comfortable in flip-flops and straight talk.
